content.question: A programmer created a piece of software and wants to publish it using a Creative Commons license. Which of the following is a direct benefit of publishing the software with this type of license?

choices.label: The programmer can ensure that the algorithms used in the software are free from bias.
The programmer can ensure that the source code for the software is backed up for archival purposes.
The programmer can include code that was written by other people in the software without needing to obtain permission.
The programmer can specify the ways that other people are legally allowed to use and distribute the software.

content.answer: The programmer can specify the ways that other people are legally allowed to use and distribute the software.

skill.text: Skill 5.E: Evaluate the use of computing based on legal and ethical factors.
